phrases: Piercing through the Macro sky,
a thunderbolt strikes the Earth
To awaken us, the young mankind,
the Light struck
Macross!
Macross!
The brave youths who arise
and fight to protect their loved ones
Will set out on their journey as the war rages on.
Will you love me tomorrow?
Slicing through the darkness they fly toward
That blue planet that shines in the distance
Macross!
Macross!
Macross!
RAINY NIGHT
I did not have to say that.
Why did I go and say that?
And here I thought you were a squadron commander.
All right, fine!
You want me to go, I will go!
And hurry.
Understood.
I am sorry.
It is been so long since we have seen each other.
I really am an awful woman.
So here you are!
Now now, why the harsh look on your face?
I get it.
Something happened between you two, right?
Not really.
Forget it.
You can lie, but it is written all over your face.
Things are not going too well with the boy, huh?
Did you want something?
I got my hands on something nice that I thought I would give to you.
What do you think?
It is top-grade black tea.
Are you sure?
This is so rare!
Not to worry.
I have secured plenty for myself.
Looks like I picked a good time to give it to you, too.
If you and the boy are fighting,
you two can drink that together and make up tonight.
We are not fighting!
It is always best to be honest.
Good work, everyone.
Go ahead and take a break.
Put her in the hangar for me, okay?
Oh, Captain!
Major Hayase wanted me to tell you to contact her.
Contact her?
Yes, sir.
She just wants me to hand in my patrol report, I bet.
Like I need her to tell me that!
Jeez, I cannot stand people who get too wrapped up in their work!
How did it go?
All quiet again today.
My report, madam.
Hikaru...
What is with that stunt you pulled?
If you said that out of jealousy, it was pretty low.
Jealousy?
I said if, did not I?
But I guess that would never happen with you.
It was just out of enthusiasm for your work.
The only thing that is important to you is your job.
You are mad, are not you?
I thought so.
I finally got to see her again!
You could have at least given me some time to talk to Minmay.
You are not very feminine, are you?
It must be stifling having to work under someone like her every day.
No, that is not...
You want to go out for some tea sometime?
M-me?!
I mean, this is inappropriate.
I am on duty.
Come on, it is all right to play hooky every once in a while.
You are horrible.
Are you sure you should be saying things like that to me?
Why?
Why?!
Major Hayase is in love with you, is not she, Captain Ichijo?
Misa?
In love with me?
No way!
The only thing she lives for is her work.
And here I was trying to apologize to him!
Captain Ichijo sure is dense, is not he?
I guess he just does not understand a woman's heart.
Judging from what just went on,
I would say the Major still has not come clean with him about how she feels.
It sure is frustrating, watching from the sidelines.
You have to proclaim your love!
Keeping it all locked up inside is so old-fashioned!
The Major's just not very open!
If she is jealous, she should come right out and say so!
Maybe her heart's just not wired the same as ours.
Could be.
If it were me, I would tell him I love you!
In front of everybody!
You just have an severe case of exhibitionism!
What is your problem?!
Ah, I am sorry!
It is bad when men are dense, but it is really bad when they are too sensitive.
You are always eavesdropping on girl talk, are not you?!
I will rip your pants off!
No way!
He thinks I am serious!
I say there is something wrong with him!
I cannot take this anymore!
It is always best to be honest.
I know, even I know that.
The only thing that is important to you is your job.
You are not very feminine, are you?
Here.
You will catch cold.
Please leave me alone.
Something did happen, did not it?
If you do not feel like having that tea with the boy,
why not drink it over at my place?
This rain will not be letting up for a while.
If you have something stronger, I would rather have that.
I do drink sometimes, you know.
Is wine okay?
It is your call.
I will join you.
Am I really so terrible?
What did the boy say to you?
The truth is, I was going to use that tea you gave me to try to apologize to him today.
But you could not.
You can tell?
I guess I really am not very feminine.
People are people.
And having different kinds of people is a good thing, right?
I really am trying to open up!
But every time I am in front of Hikaru, I just...
Here, have some more.
I am not drunk yet.
Nobody's saying you are.
No matter how things are between you now,
just be thankful that the man you love is still alive.
After he died, this is what got me through the nights.
It is not like that now though.
Mind if I ask you something?
Were things always good between you and Major Focker?
After we ran into each other again on the Macross, yes.
But before then, it was all fits and starts.
Say, would you like me to tell you about him?
This I have got to hear!
Maybe I did go a little too far...
I met him back during the Unification Wars.
When I enlisted, I was stationed at a base in the middle of nowhere.
And I was so naive back then...
Anyway, that is where he was.
Hey, baby!
Look over here!
Over here!
Hey, cutie!
Lieutenant!
New recruits!
I am Lt. Roy Focker!
At your service, ladies!
Hi there!
It was not until a week later that I spoke to him.
There they are!
These guys coming in from the front are the only ones you picked up?
Roger.
It is just the five planes coming in from the southwest.
Your name's Claudia, is not it?
You are pretty cute!
Lt. Focker?
How about a date sometime?
Even out here in the boonies they have got some pretty good restaurants.
When is good for you?
Lieutenant!
Please refrain from personal conversations!
Do you really think this is the right time?!
It is improper!
Oh yeah, I like that!
That is exactly the prim way new recruits should be!
To be honest, my first impression of him was not a good one.
Or rather, I did not really understand how his mind worked.
Still, half out of curiosity, I agreed to a date.
And then...
Huh?
Hey!
Sorry I am late.
I totally forgot I had a date with my friends here.
You do not mind if they come along, do you?
Hey, squeeze together a little!
Someone else is getting in.
Come on, hop in!
What is the matter?
That is all right.
Excuse me.
Hey, wait!
Hey!
Forget about her!
Hurry up, let us go for a drive!
So I went home in shock, wondering if he was bold or just incredibly thoughtless.
I am on duty.
This is inappropriate.
I am going to come here every day until you go on a date with me.
You cannot be serious!
Enemy fighters closing in!
Oh, no!
'Til tomorrow, then.
Claudia, patch me through to the main base.
Claudia!
Right!
I had no idea.
I cannot believe the Major had a side like that to him.
At any rate, he was operating way outside the bounds of what made sense to me.
And yet, I missed him when he was not around.
It is like my heart was being twisted in knots.
Was he sent to the front lines?
No, the Unification Wars ended and he was transferred to South Ataria Island.
To the Macross.
Right, but he never wrote me a single letter, not for a whole year,
and after he would made a spectacle of himself coming to see me every day.
But you came to the Macross too.
It must have been fate.
Being transferred to the same base as him...
Going to school for full-time crew training where I met you and we became roommates...
It is hard to understand the ties that bind people together, huh?
And their hearts too.
No matter how long I waited, he never came to say hello
It is been a long time.
Oh, hi!
It is you.
How are you?
I heard you would come here.
Well, I would like to give you these back.
What are these?
Oh... you kept this stuff?
Ah, that is, if you insist.
Feast your eyes on this baby!
It is still under development, but it is a new kind of fighter that will even be able to transform,
the VF-X-1.
Its speed and engine performance blow away anything that is ever been flown.
We are finally taking her up for a test flight tomorrow.
Huh?
Hey!
Hey!
Right after that, I fell into a bad bout of self-loathing.
I asked myself why I did not just tell him how I felt.
I could not open up.
I said it is hard to understand people's hearts but back then, I really did not have a clue.
It was about two hours or so before the prototype's test flight.
I had not seen him around so I got worried,
thinking that he must be holed up by himself somewhere.
That is when...
No way!
No!
Well, how is that?
Pretty good, huh?
You understand, do not you?
The way I felt when I saw him fooling around with those girls?
Yes...
But the whole time, I would been jealous because I was only seeing one side of him.
It was the night after the test flight.
That is right, it was raining, just like now.
Hello?
It is me, Focker.
Captain!
I want to see you, right away.
Do you have any idea what time it is?
The middle of the night, probably.
You are drunk, are not you?
I want to see you.
It will only take a minute.
This really is not...
I am not trying to barge into your room or anything.
Where are you?
A phone booth across from your quarters.
You are here?!
I have had a lot to drink, but I am still sober.
Hold on.
Hey.
I am sorry to call you out in the middle of the night like this.
Captain!
Oh, I did not bring a handkerchief with me.
No, that is okay.
Did something happen?
No...
No, let me explain.
This probably will not matter to you at all, but I want you to hear this.
Before the prototype test flight today,
I was making an ass of myself with some of the women in the squad.
My superiors gave me a good chewing out for it...
But the thing is, even I get scared.
That is how it is with pilots.
People may think that we get into our planes without a care,
but sometimes we think to ourselves, I going to die tomorrow?'
And there are times we cannot go through with it unless we say some pretty stupid things.
You mind if I keep going?
Back when we were at the old base together,
it was those feelings that made me go to your place with bouquets.
Do not be mad.
As you know, I have got lots of women friends.
But you were the only one I thought of when I wanted to tell someone about this.
Today was a low-level flight,
but tomorrow, we will push it to full speed at an altitude of 1,000 meters.
Captain...
That is all.
Thanks.
I never knew.
Major Hayase is in love with you, is not she, Captain Ichijo?
Misa's in love with me...!
That is strange.
Maybe she is on the Macross.
She went home?
Two hours ago?
Thanks.
I wonder where she went?
Well?
Hard to believe, huh?
I guess I only knew one side of Major Focker.
I fell in love with him for real after that.
Anyway, whatever happens, do not let it get to you.
Focker used to tell me about the boy all the time.
He said he is pretty bad at expressing himself.
I guess we both fell for pilots, huh?
Hello?
Ichijo!
Yes, she is right here.
Sure, that would be great.
He says he is on his way.
To do what?
I would like to have a drink with this guy tonight.
Sorry, but would you mind heading home?
I am in the way?
Very much so.
But...
Good evening!
It is Ichijo!
Go on, beat it!
Beat it!
You forgot something.
It is time for you to use this.
It is always best to be honest.
Do not make such a weird face.
I am not.
I just wanted to apologize.
I went a little overboard this afternoon.
Do I smell of alcohol?
You have been drinking?
Yes, a little wine.
Oh...
Say, I managed to get my hands on some pretty rare tea.
Would you like to have some with me?
I will take you up on that.
Okay, let us go to my place.
Oh, no!
I am out of sugar.
That is all right.
All we need is hot water.
Now that is something I got plenty of!
Next Episode
Preview
For the first time in two years, Hikaru and Minmay get to spend time alone together.
However, this happens only because Hikaru breaks a picnic date with Misa.
Unaware of this, Misa continues to wait for Hikaru alone.
PRIVATE TIME
PRIVATE TIME
I will not follow it anymore
The shadow you cast as you run away
We all keep running to the end
But we still cannot see the goal
What awaits us after today?
What awaits us beyond tomorrow?
Even now, I keep running toward
The light that shines so far away
